meanings.definition: To remove the pineal gland surgically.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pinealectomized the patient to treat their condition.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon successfully pinealectomized the tumor from the pineal gland.
meanings.sent3: After the operation, the pinealectomized patient joked about having a 'pineapple' gland instead.
meanings.sent4: The removal of the pineal gland pinealectomized the source of the problem, bringing relief.
meanings.sent5: The procedure to pinealectomize the gland was quick and precise.

meanings.definition: Having undergone a surgical removal of the pineal gland.
meanings.sent1: The pinealectomized patient felt different after the surgery.
meanings.sent2: She was a pinealectomized individual, but she continued to live a fulfilling life.
meanings.sent3: The pinealectomized teddy bear in the toy store had a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams seemed brighter after becoming pinealectomized.
meanings.sent5: The pinealectomized cat seemed to sleep more peacefully.
